description: Try our easy to follow Coconut Hot Choc recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
keywords: Hot chocolate,Pescatarian,Low salt,Seafood free,Gluten free,Egg free,Sesame free,Wheat free,Vegetarian,Chocolate,Peanut free
name: Coconut Hot Choc Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Combine brown sugar and cocoa powder in a saucepan. Stir in of low-fat milk to form a smooth paste. Gradually stir in 2 cups low-fat milk and coconut milk and vanilla extract until smooth. Bring to a gentle simmer over medium-low heat, stirring occasionally. Divide dark chocolate, chopped, between 4 glasses. Pour over hot milk mixture. Top with whipped cream, marshmallows and grated chocolate.
